text: Barry Morris Goldwater Jr. (born July 15, 1938) is an American politician and businessman. He is a former Republican member of the United States House of Representatives from California from 1969 to 1983. He is the son of former U.S. Senator and 1964 Republican presidential nominee Barry Goldwater. On November 16, 2007, Goldwater publicly endorsed Republican presidential candidate Ron Paul of Texas for the GOP nomination in 2008.Ron Paul Endorsed by Barry Goldwater Jr. â€“ Ron Paul 2008 ==References== ==Other websites== * Barry Goldwater Jr. Official Website * Congressional Biography * * HBO Interview in Mr. Conservative * Goldwater Institute * Barry M.
